content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 16-23)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-5.0, 2.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) (now with additional pump at (-9.5, -2.5))
- Boiler at (-5.0, 2.5) (currently missing/unavailable)
- Steam engine at (0.5, 6.5) (currently missing/unavailable)
- Pipe network connecting offshore pumps (water)
- Small electric poles at (0.5, 8.5) and (3.5, 9.5)

### Chemical Plant Complex at position (6.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Chemical plant (set to produce sulfur, currently without power)
- Storage tank at (3.5, 12.5)
- Partial water pipe connection from offshore pump
- Missing petroleum gas input
- Missing power connection

### Water Pipe Network
Consists of:
- Two offshore pumps at (-9.5, -0.5) and (-9.5, -2.5)
- Extensive pipe network connecting to chemical plant
- Multiple pipe groups with varying statuses (WORKING, FULL_OUTPUT, EMPTY)

## ERROR TIPS

### Entity placement distance issues
- Move closer to target position before attempting to place entities (max distance is 10 tiles)
- Verify player position relative to target placement location
- Consider moving in stages when building distant structures

### Missing entity errors
- Verify entities exist before attempting to interact with them
- Check for entity destruction or removal before making assertions
- Implement existence checks before get_entity calls

### Power system failures
- Steam engine assertion failed due to lack of power production
- Verify all power generation components are properly connected
- Check fuel supply to boilers and water supply to steam engines

### Inventory management issues
- Check inventory before attempting to place entities
- Track entity counts in inventory to prevent placement attempts without items
- Implement inventory checks before placement operations

### Chemical plant operational issues
- Power connection still missing despite attempts
- Petroleum gas input not connected
- Verify all recipe requirements are met before expecting production

### Placement collision issues
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones
- Consider alternative directions or spacing when placement fails
- Verify terrain is suitable for placement (avoid water tiles)

### Pipe network problems
- Some pipe groups showing EMPTY status despite connections
- Verify fluid types match throughout the network
- Check for breaks or missing connections in pipe chains
